Ingredients.5: 3 dashes hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's® RedHot), or more to taste

Ingredients.8: 12 cups fresh broccoli florets, or more to taste

Ingredients.9: 3 cups fruit and nut trail mix

Ingredients.10: 0.5 large red onion, diced into 1/4-inch pieces

Directions.1: Mix together mayonnaise, sugar, vinegar, and hot sauce in a medium bowl until smooth. Set aside to allow sugar to dissolve into dressing.

Directions.2: Meanwhile, cook bacon in a large skillet over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain bacon slices on paper towels and let cool enough to handle, about 10 minutes. Crumble.

Directions.3: Combine crumbled bacon, broccoli, trail mix, and red onion in a large serving bowl. Add dressing and toss thoroughly.
